originalText.text: DJ Milin from Dhoom Events did our wedding and he was outstanding! We did two ceremonies during the day (Hindu and Jewish) and had a fusion styled reception. DJ Milin incorporated the type of music we wanted (including Bollywood music and the Hora!) and read the room perfectly as he made adjustments in real time. We would highly recommend him for any wedding but especially a multicultural wedding. My wife and I had an amazing time and received great feedback from guests. One of the best dance floors we’ve been on!

originalText.text:
Milan was absolutely amazing! He was very professional, friendly, kind and dedicated! We can't thank him enough for being part of our destination wedding in Cancun, Mexico. He went above and beyond with each events entertainment as he MC'd and DJ'd three events and incorporated our music choices and kept each evening energetic and fun! He made each night incredibly special, we are forever grateful and couldn't be more happy with our choice in Milan!
Shomaila & Omer

originalText.text: I worked with Milin for my wedding and it was a great experience. Very communicative and helped provide me templates for all the information he needed, which was helpful since this was my first time booking a DJ for an event. We had a call a few days before the event where he walked me through step by step exactly what was going to happen, and stuck to that schedule. Highly recommend!

text.text: I worked with Milin for my wedding and it was a great experience. originalText.text: Dhoom did a great job with our wedding! They were attentive to detail, friendly, and professional. They understood our unique vision and used their expertise to enhance and expand upon our ideas. The highlight was the tabla player, Rana. He was able to curate a playlist that both satisfied our unique taste and sounded great with the tabla. He was a huge hit with both kids and adults. We are so happy we went with Dhoom and we are grateful to them for making our wedding unique and fun!

text.text: Dhoom did a great job with our wedding! They were attentive to detail, friendly, and professional. They understood our unique vision and used their expertise to enhance and expand upon our ideas. The highlight was the tabla player, Rana. He was able to curate a playlist that both satisfied our unique taste and sounded great with the tabla. He was a huge hit with both kids and adults. We are so happy we went with Dhoom and we are grateful to them for making our wedding unique and fun!

originalText.text: We chose Dhoom enetertainment for our wedding and reception day. Milin was awesome. He is genuinely nice and tries his best to accomodate the clients. Throughout the whole event, all the guests were rocking on the dance floor as the song selection by Milin was great. We had a timing issue with our wedding but Milin was so generous and helpful that he was able to rebook the barat horse and the dhol players for us. based on new timing. We would highly recommend him for all the events and are very happy with Dhoom events. Thank you Milin for making this a great event.
